name: Verify that field FEIN and Business Description should be mandatory and Contact's email and phone to be optional for quick quote

testSteps.description: Given underwriter has ability to create quick quote

When underwriter updates Description <BusinessDescription>, FEIN <FEIN>, Contact's Email<ContactEmail> and Phone<Phone> as
| BusinessDescription | FEIN | ContactEmail | Phone |
|  |  |  |  |
Then validation message on FEIN and Business Description should be thrown 'This is a required field. Please input value.'
And there should not be any validations on ContactEmail and Phone
